fields.description:
The OP HMI (on RED OP) displays a common Radiobook containing RED only, BLACK only and RED/BLACK domain radios.
The single domain radiobooks of the RED and BLACK OP are merged and presented in one list to the operator.

SSDD_PRi_20120312_28
OP Red Black Control of Red multi-domain iPOS will generate Red-Black specific radio indications on TSD. Those indications are:
* Allowed COMSEC modes indication in Radio Book

DDs from Rel.7.1:
*SSDD_PRi_20120312_22*
OP Red Black Control of Black multi-domain iPOS will be responsible for redirection of Radio Book generated in black iPOS application towards its counterpart in Red Domain.
*SSDD_PRi_20120312_26*
OP Red Black Control of Red multi-domain iPOS will be responsible for merging redirection of Radio Book generated in black iPOS and red iPOS and forwarding the result towards TSD.

CATCCMATS-HMIDD_MAIN-300:
In variation to the civil Radio Directory Window:
For the [Radio Service]s the available security modes shown in the List Box in an additional column.
Values for the security modes are "P", "S", "P/S".

 !Radio_directory.png|thumbnail!
fields.customfield_13600: CVCSXO-1301 is caused by: OSSS (1 item) Approved CATCCMATS-SSS_MAIN-1251 GID-3998201 Add Radio Service from Radio Book: The [VCS MAIN] shall enable [Voice User](s) to add a [Radio Service] to their [Allocated Radio Service](s) from a list of [Radio Service](s) defined in [Adaptation] for each [CMATS Partition]. Requirements changed: No requirements linked.

comments.body:
KANBAN 08.05.
[~rfeiel] CMATS SSS needed (copy from EVCS-SSS-559)
_(The [VCS Subsystem] shall provide the capability for an [Operator] to add a connection to a [Radio Service] at a [Voice Workstation] from a list planned in the [Communication Configuration].) _
[~mmayerho] TMCS effort will be shifted to further iterations 
[~dmitterm] please update effort estimation
[~tdanzer] please create CMATS WP and link
[~tdanzer] HMIDD is needed ASAP

[~dmitterm] please update effort estimation (/)
[~tdanzer] please create CMATS WP and link (/)
[~tdanzer] HMIDD is needed ASAP (x)
CATCCMATS-SSS_MAIN-1251 created and linked to CVCSXO-STY-120.

[~tdanzer], Radio Book on black OP only displays black radios?
If yes, should it be narrower, then?
[~tdanzer], Radio Book on black OP only displays black radios? (I don't read this restriction from CATCCMATS-SSS_MAIN-1251)

[~tdanzer], Radio Book on black OP only displays black radios? (I don't see this restriction in CATCCMATS-SSS_MAIN-1251)
If yes, should it be narrower, then?

Currently it is not known whether the information about Secure/Plain Radios is needed in the common radio book. 
See comment in CATCCMATS-1724
*Decision:*
for now we leave this out of the development scope and handle it when feedback is received from Thales regarding this topic.

Currently it is not known whether the information about Secure/Plain Radios is needed in the common radio book. 
See comment in CATCCMATS-1724
*Decision:*
Kanban 24/5
RFE, MAY, TGL, TDA, HRA, DMI
for now we leave this out of the development scope and handle it when feedback is received from Thales regarding this topic.

items.toString: This issue is a clone of CVCSXO-1289

The OP HMI (on RED OP) displays a common Radiobook containing RED only, BLACK only and RED/BLACK domain radios.
The single domain radiobooks of the RED and BLACK OP are merged and presented in one list to the operator.

items.fromString: This issue is a clone of CVCSXO-1289

The OP HMI (on RED OP) displays a common Radiobook containing RED only, BLACK only and RED/BLACK domain radios.
The single domain radiobooks of the RED and BLACK OP are merged and presented in one list to the operator.
items.toString:
The OP HMI (on RED OP) displays a common Radiobook containing RED only, BLACK only and RED/BLACK domain radios.
The single domain radiobooks of the RED and BLACK OP are merged and presented in one list to the operator.

DDs from Rel.7.1:
*SSDD_PRi_20120312_22*
OP Red Black Control of Black multi-domain iPOS will be responsible for redirection of Radio Book generated in black iPOS application towards its counterpart in Red Domain.
*SSDD_PRi_20120312_26*
OP Red Black Control of Red multi-domain iPOS will be responsible for merging redirection of Radio Book generated in black iPOS and red iPOS and forwarding the result towards TSD.

items.toString:
The OP HMI (on RED OP) displays a common Radiobook containing RED only, BLACK only and RED/BLACK domain radios.
The single domain radiobooks of the RED and BLACK OP are merged and presented in one list to the operator.

SSDD_PRi_20120312_28
OP Red Black Control of Red multi-domain iPOS will generate Red-Black specific radio indications on TSD. Those indications are:
    Allowed COMSEC modes indication in Radio Book

DDs from Rel.7.1:
*SSDD_PRi_20120312_22*
OP Red Black Control of Black multi-domain iPOS will be responsible for redirection of Radio Book generated in black iPOS application towards its counterpart in Red Domain.
*SSDD_PRi_20120312_26*
OP Red Black Control of Red multi-domain iPOS will be responsible for merging redirection of Radio Book generated in black iPOS and red iPOS and forwarding the result towards TSD.

CATCCMATS-HMIDD_MAIN-300:
In variation to the civil Radio Directory Window:
For the [Radio Service]s the available security modes shown in the List Box in an additional column.
Values for the security modes are "P", "S", "P/S".

 !screenshot-1.png|thumbnail!
